projects.title: MGP TECH INNOVATION - 3 Digit 7 Segment Display
projects.description: Custom-designed 3-digit 7-segment display system featuring multiplexing techniques, precise timing control, and real-time number visualization. Built with microcontroller programming and custom circuit design.

projects.title: Hardware Interface & Control System
projects.description: Interactive hardware demonstration showcasing real-time control systems, sensor integration, and user interface mechanisms for embedded applications.

projects.title: Embedded System Integration
projects.description: Complete hardware-software integration project demonstrating seamless communication between microcontroller, peripherals, and control logic with optimized performance.

projects.title: IoT Innovation Project
projects.description: Latest IoT-enabled electronics project featuring wireless connectivity, data monitoring, and smart control systems for modern embedded applications.
